data.eml:eml: A new and presumably extinct species of Ptychochromoides (Teleostei: Perciformes: Cichlidae) from central Madagascar.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article John S. Sparks (2004): A new and presumably extinct species of Ptychochromoides (Teleostei: Perciformes: Cichlidae) from central Madagascar. Zootaxa 524: 1-15, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:1621B03B-EBD7-49FA-8250-08A31072A2CD
